text:
1. Would you be reinstalling Windows 7 using Windows 7 media and attempting to
upgrade to Windows 10 ? 
Or 
2. Would you be installing(clean install, reinstalll) of Windows 10(e.g. 22H2)
using Windows 10 created media or mounted ISO (i.e. using the digital Window 10
license assigned to the device)? 
As I understood the policy change – reactivation/activation impacts the
former(1), but not the latter(2) 
Also, afaik….the digital licensing of Windows 10 applies to devices for Windows
10 (install or upgrade) using a Local Account and Microsoft Account to setup
Windows 10 during the install or upgrade process. 
…w
%40BYAPR05MB6552.namprd05.prod.outlook.com
